release.action: Changed from update(Diff) to update(DiffReader).
Added support for commit()/setAutocommit() in DelegatingModel.

Moved 'org.semweb4j.rdf2go.util' package to its own project (jar) to allow for independent evolution - 'util' was often evolving much faster than the rest, causing unnecessary releases of RDF2Go adapters. Adapters do not depend on 'util'.
Improved rdf2go.util.ModelUtils.load... methods

Language tags in literals are now always lowercase. Thanks Leo. http://www.w3.org/TR/2004/REC-rdf-concepts-20040210/#section-Graph-Literal "Plain literals have a lexical form and optionally a language tag as defined by [RFC-3066], normalized to lowercase."
DiffImpl now optimizes diff: Statements that are added and removed are removed from the diff.
Migration to RDF2Go API 4.4.9 (isEmpty)
Implemented NotifyingModelSetLayer
Fixed a bug in DiffImpl
Added LanguageTools which allos to reduce an RDF model to literals in a desired language.
Added support for file conversion to ModelUtils.
Change reference to a stable, released parent POM
AbstractModelFactory: Setting property for in-memory.
Added checks in AbstractModel to check if model is still open. This prevents a hard to find null pointer exception, if the model has been closed before.
Switched from commons-logging to slf4j.
Bugfix in AbstractModelSetImpl.contains(Statement);
Deprecated AbstractModelSetImpl.containsModel/removeModel - they cannot be implemented correctly in the abstract layer.
Bugfix: There was an infinite loop in DelegatingModel.readFrom/writeTo.
AbstractModelSetImpl.createQuadPattern
Added check for null in DiffImpl.equals
Bugfix: Added model.open() calls in LazyUnionModelIterator
Bugfix in ModelAddRemoveMemoryImpl.iterator()
Added hashCode to QuadPatternImpl and TriplePatternImpl
Improved code in QueryRowImpl
Added URIGenerator.createNewRandomUniqueURI with given uriPrefix
Added org.ontoware.rdf2go.util.ModelUtils for size, copy, union, and intersection of models.
Added org.ontoware.rdf2go.util.TypeConverter for conversion of DatatypeLiterals to Java types.
Removed deprecated method AbstractModelSetImpl.getUnderlyingModelImplementation
Moved asInt() and asBoolean() from Node to DatatypeLiteral. Commented Node better.
Added "toSPARQL()" to Node, so that one can more easily build SPARQL queries.
Removed redundant equals() and hashCode() from interfaces and explained it instead in JavaDoc. Removed NodeImpl superclass - it had no functionality.
Added OSGi activator.
Added a similiar interface hierarchy like the one found in Model to ModelSet. So now we have ModelSetIO, ModelSetAddRemove, ...etc.
Together with Leo Sauermann: Added RDF2Go singlton which acts as a registry for ModelFactory implementations.
Added ModelIO interface for proper read/write support.
Added OSGi-MANIFEST.
Added a number of problem-specific exception.
Internal refactoring which do not affect the API at all
Many magic strings are now proper Java constants
Added more Javadoc comments
Iterators are now mandatory auto-close when fully traversed (they must close themselves, when fully traversed)
Changed Iterable<Statement> into Iterable<? extends Statement> for all methods, that do not inherit from java.util.Iterable
Added int countStatements(TriplePattern pattern) to FindableModel. Is implemented (inefficiently) in AbstractModel.
Added "open()" and "close()" to Model interface
Moved all Factory-like methods into a new interface ModelValueFactory, which is inherited by the Model interface, so nothing changes for Model.

Created new interface ModelEssence, which captures the "essence" of being a model. An adapter (ModelEssenceAdapter) implements Model by delegating to a ModelEssence instance. Not efficient, but clean.
Many little changes. RDFGo now depends on "aifbcommons" which includes some nice, generic Iterators.
Removed ModelImplMemory, instead, newInstance is now used to create a new instance of a given (context) model.
Methods throw now a ModelException, not a generic Exception any longer
Added dump support for context model
Added support for sparql construct queries
Split adaptors into separate downloads. Now each RDF2Go compliant adaptor is released separately.
Changed to ANT build process.
Added experiemental JCR support (using JackRabbit as a triple store).
Added OWL-DL vocabulary.
Added adapter for Sesame 1.2.
First public release. Works with Jena 2.2, Yars build 1217 and NG4J 0.4.
